data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Betis needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Cristian Tello gets his shot on target but fails to score for Betis.
In the minute 9, Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 14, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Real Sociedad are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 16, Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In Seville, Nabil Fekir of Betis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Betis.
Portu for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Portu for Real Sociedad is whistled offside.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows against Real Sociedad's Mikel Oyarzabal for offside.
In the minute 23, Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
Betis push upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Betis.
In the minute 25, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Free kick for Betis in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 28, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 30, Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cristian Tello of Betis gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
In the minute 32, Mikel Oyarzabal of Real Sociedad is pulled up for offside.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad are coming forward and Willian Jose gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
At Benito Villamarin, Real Sociedad are penalized for being offside.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 43, Portu scores to make it 0-1 at Benito Villamarin.
Mikel Oyarzabal with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
The first-half is over at Benito Villamarin.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez has blown to start the second-half.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Borja Iglesias with Antonio Sanabria. This is the first substitution made today by Manuel Pellegrini.
In Seville Betis's Antonio Sanabria is caught offside.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Betis.
Goal kick for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Sidnei (Betis) has received a first yellow card.
The match at Benito Villamarin has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andoni Gorosabel, who is down injured.
In the minute 55, Andoni Gorosabel has recovered and rejoins the match in Seville.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Sergio Canales with William Carvalho.
Loren Moron is on a sub for Joaquin for Betis.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Real Sociedad's Mikel Oyarzabal has run offside.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Betis to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Imanol Alguacil is making the team's first substitution at Benito Villamarin with Martin Zubimendi replacing Ander Guevara.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Betis, close to Real Sociedad's area.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 69, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Imanol Alguacil (Real Sociedad) is making a second substitution, with Alexander Isak replacing Willian Jose.
Betis are pushing forward but Cristian Tello's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Betis.
In the minute 71, Real Sociedad advance rapidly upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows for offside.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 72, Betis to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marc Bartra (Betis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Mikel Oyarzabal extends Real Sociedad's lead from the spot. They now lead 0-2.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Betis make their fourth substitution with Juan Miranda replacing Alex Moreno.
Diego Lainez is replacing Cristian Tello for the home team.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Betis.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis.
Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Betis surge into the attack at Benito Villamarin but Aitor Ruibalâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 83, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
The away team replace Mikel Oyarzabal with Adnan Januzaj.
Roberto Lopez is replacing David Silva for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 85, Real Sociedad drives forward and Alexander Isak gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In Seville Real Sociedad attack through Portu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Benito Villamarin.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis.
In the minute 87, Alexander Isak is booked for the away team.
Goal! Real Sociedad extend their lead to 0-3 through Adnan Januzaj.
Great play from Alexander Isak to set up the goal.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Sociedad goal kick.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In Seville, Real Sociedad push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's full-time at Benito Villamarin. The final score is 0-3.
